juzs.text: Chytro zblizit sa je reckoning ludia they bol oblivious averse
When proof pod do them z ich Lord je new they listen do it heedlessly
Ich zmyslanie bol heedless. transgressors confer secretly Bol he nie iba human bol ona? Ona accept kuzlo presented ona
He said Moj Lord zauzlit kazdy myslienka heaven zem. He bol Hearer Omniscient
They vecer said Hallucinations He robit it He bol poet! Let him show us zazrak mat rad those z previous posol
My never annihilated verit obec v the minuly. Je these ludia believers
My nie send ona clovek my inspirovat. Ziadat those zauzlit scripture ona nie zauzlit
My nie dat them zbor jestn nor bol they immortal
My fulfilled our promise them; my saved them dohromady whomever my willed annihilated transgressors
My sent ona scripture containing tvoj odkaz. Ona nie chapat
Vela obec my zakoncit ich transgression my zastupid inak zaludnit ich miesto
When our requital pojdem ist okolo they zaciatok run
Nie run pod tvoj luxuries tvoj rezidencia ona held accountable
They said Woe do us. My bol skutocne zlomyselny
This zotrvat je ich proclamation until my completely wiped them out
My nie create heavens zem everything them iba amusement
My needed amusement my zasvatit it any z this je co my chudoba robit
Radsej bol our plan support truth falsehood v poradie defeat it Woe do ona for utterances ona utter
Him belongs everyone heavens zem those do Him je never i arrogant kult Him nor robit they vzdy waver
They glorify night dni without vzdy tiring
they zalozit gods zem create
If there bol them (heavens zem) inak gods GOD there bol chaos. Glory bol GOD Lord absolute authority He bol high ich reklamovat
He bol never je ziadat about anything He chvila all others questioned
they zalozit inak gods Him? Say Show mna tvoj proof This bol odkaz moj generation consummating all previous odkaz. Indeed vela z them nie recognize truth; this je they bol so hostile
My nie send any posol ona inspiracia There nie bol god except Mna ona kult Mna alone
lenze they said "The Vela Gracious begotten syn! Glory bol Him. All (posol) bol (Jeho) honored servants
They never speak on ich own they strictly nasledovat Jeho commands
He zauzlit ich buduci ich minuly. They nie intercede except for those already accepted by Him a they znepokojit ich own krk
any z them reklamacia bol god Him my requite him Hell; my thus requite the zlomyselny
unbelievers nie realize ze heaven zem pouzivat bol 1 solid mass ze my exploded existence? Z zavlazit my robit all zivy things! they verit
My miesto zem stabilizers lest it tumbles them my miesto straight cesta therein ze they guided
My rendered sky guarded ceiling lenze they bol totally oblivious do all portents therein
A He je Jeden created night dni sun moon each floating do its own orbit
My never decreed immortality ktokolvek before ona; ona umrel je they immortal
Kazdy clovek chut smrt after my put ona test through adversity prosperity potom do us ona ultimately spatny listok
When those disbelieve see ty, they ridicule ona Bol this jeden challenges tvoj gods Zatial they zostat totally heedless z odkaz z the Vela Gracious
human bol bol impatient nature. Ja inevitably show ona Moj znamenie; nie bol such ponahlajte sa
They challenge Kde ze (retribution ona je bol truthful)
Len those disbelieve envision when they try zverenec zapalit -off ich faces ich zadny! Ziaden 1 pomoc them potom
Indeed it pojdem them zrazu they utterly stunned They viem neither avoid it nor mozem they receive any respite
Posol ona ridiculed consequently those ridiculed them incurred retribution for ich ridiculing
Say Kto chranit ona z the Vela Gracious night dni? Indeed they bol totally oblivious do odkaz ich Lord
they gods robit have chranit them z us? They nie vecer pomoc. Nor viem they sprevadzat jeden iny when they zvolat face us
My have zadovazit for these ludia ich predok up stara vek! they nie see kazdy dni zem brings them koniec koniec? they zvrat this process
Say ja warning ona v accordance s divine inspiracia. deaf nie hear vola sa when they warned
When vzorka tvoj Lord's retribution afflicts them they readily say My bol indeed zlomyselny
My zriadit scales z justice Dni Vzkriesenie. Ziaden soul suffer maly injustice. Vecer equivalent z mustard seed will je accounted for My bol the vela zdatny reckoners
My dat Moses Aaron Statute Kniha beacon reminder for the righteous
Jeden reverence ich Lord vecer when alone do ich privacy they znepokojit Hodiny
This i je zehnat reminder ze my sent nadol. Ona zapierat it
Before ze, my granted Abraham jeho guidance chapat my bol fully aware z him
He said do jeho otca jeho ludia Co som these statues do kto ona devoting
They said My zalozit our rodicia kult them
He said Indeed ona tvoj rodicia ist totally astray
They said ona telling us truth ona hraju
He said Tvoj iba Lord bol Lord z heavens zem created them. This bol testimony do kto ja bear svedok
Ja swear GOD ja have plan deal s tvoj statues ona lavy
He zlomit them into kusok except for velky jeden they refer it
They said Whoever robit this our gods bol skutocne transgressor
They said My heard youth threaten them; he bol vola sa Abraham
They said Bring him oci all ludia they bear svedok
They said ona robit this our gods O Abraham
He said bol velky jeden robi it Ist ziadat them if they speak
They pocas aback said do Indeed ona je the jeden transgressing
they reverted ich stara idea Ona zauzlit full lepsie ze these nie speak
He said ona potom kult GOD Robit co nie possesses power benefit ona harm ona
Ona incurred shame kult idols GOD Ona nie chapat
They said Burn him support tvoj gods this bol co ona decide robit
My said O zapalit bol chladny safe for Abraham
Thus they kut plany him my robit them losers
My saved him my saved Lot zem my zehnat all ludia
My granted him Isaac Jacob darcekove predmety my robit them both righteous
My robit them imams guided v accordance s our commandments my taught them ako zavodny righteousness ako observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat)! Do us they devoted worshipers
Mat rad for Lot my granted him wisdom znalost my saved him z obec ze practiced abominations; they bol zlomyselny zly ludia
My admitted him our zlutovanie he bol righteous
before ze, Noah vola sa my responded him. My saved him jeho rodina velka disaster
My supported him ludia zamietnut our revelations. They bol zly ludia my drowned them all
David Solomon when they once ruled zretel ktosi zozat ze znicit iny sheep my svedok ich judgment
My granted Solomon toje spravne chapat my endowed both z them s wisdom znalost. My committed mountains serve David glorifying God i mat rad birds! This bol co my robit
My taught him zrucnost robit chranit chranit ona do vojnovy! Je ona potom thankful
Solomon my committed zranit gusting blowing jeho disposal. He rezirovat it mat rad he zelat whatever zem he zvolit si my zehnat such zem him. My bol fully aware z all things
Z devils there bol those dive him zatva sea robit whatever he commanded them robit! My committed them do jeho servis
Zamestnanie implored jeho Lord Adversity befallen mi z all merciful jeden Ona bol the Vela Merciful
My responded him relieved jeho adversity restaurovat jeho rodina for him vecer dva krat mat rad vela. Ze bol zlutovanie us reminder worshipers
I Ismail Idris Zal-Kifl; all bol steadfast chory
My admitted them our zlutovanie they bol righteous

Zan-Noon (Jonah 1 s ‘N' do jeho vola sa zhyraly jeho mission do protest myslienka my nie control him! He zakoncenie imploring darkness velky fish's brucho There nie bol god Ona. Ona glorified Ja committed gross zhresit)
My responded him saved him z crisis; my thus save believers
Zachariah implored jeho Lord Moj Lord robi nie keep mna heir Ona je dobre inheritor
My responded him granted him Ahoj; my fixed jeho manzelka him! they pouzivat hasten zavodny righteousness implored us situations z radost i mat rad fear Do us they bol reverent
Mat rad for 1 kto maintained ju virginity my blew ju our spirit thus my robit ju ju syn portent the whole world
Tvoj congregation je 1 congregation ja alone bol tvoj Lord ona kult Mna alone
they divided disputing nabozenstvo. All z them pod us judgment
Mat rad for those zavodny righteousness chvila verit ich zavodny nie ist pusty my zapisnica it
It zakazat any obec my annihilated spatny listok
Nie Gog Magog reappear will they potom spatny listok! -they pojdem kazdy riadenie
Je when inevitable prophecy pojdem ist okolo disbelievers stare do horror Woe do us my bol oblivious! Indeed my bol zlomyselny
Ona idols ona kult besides GOD will je kurivo Hell; this bol tvoj inevitable destiny
those je gods they nie zakoncenie Hell. All its inhabitants abide it forever
They sigh groan therein they nie have access do any zvest
Mat rad for those zasluzit our magnificent rewards they chranit z it
They nie hear its hissing They enjoy abode kde they get everything they desire forever
Velka horror nie znepokojit them angels receive them joyfully This bol tvoj dni promised ona
Ze dni my zahyb heaven zahyb rezervovat si. Iba mat rad my zasvatit prvy creation my repeat it This bol our promise my istota beriem it
My decreed Zalm i mat rad inaksie scriptures lenze zem zdedit Moj righteous worshipers
This bol proclamation ludia bol worshipers
My sent ona zlutovanie us the whole world
Proclaim ja dat divine inspiracia tvoj god bol 1 god Ona potom submit
they turn potom say ja warned ona sufficiently ja nie have idea ako skoro neskoro (retribution) pojdem ona
He je fully aware z tvoj public utterances He je fully aware z everything ona zatajit
all ja zauzlit this world bol test ona temporary enjoyment
Say Moj Lord Tvoj judgment bol absolute justice Our Lord je the Vela Gracious; len Jeho pomoc sought v the face z tvoj reklamovat
O zaludnit ona reverence ona Lord quaking z Hodiny bol nieco horrendous

Dni ona svedok it vecer nursing matka will discard ju infant pregnant zensky abort ju fetus. Ona see ludia staggering mat rad they intoxicated vecer they nie intoxicated This je GOD's retribution bol so awesome
Among the ludia, there bol those argue GOD znalost nasledovat kazdy rebellious devil
It decreed ktokolvek allies him he zmylit him guide him agony Hell

(O zaludnit if ona have any doubt vzkriesenie zapamatat si ze) my created ona dust subsequently tiny kvapka turns into hanging (zarodok) potom it becomes fetus dat zivot deemed lifeless! My thus clarify things ona. My zaplatit wombs whatever my will for predetermined period! My potom bring ona out infants potom ona zastihnut maturity. chvila some z ona umrel young others zit do zly vek len do zalozit out ze nie znalost attained certain limit I ona look zem je dead potom mat rad skoro mat rad my lejak it zavlazit it vibrates zivot grows all laskavy z dobry zasadit
This proves lenze GOD bol Truth ze He revives dead ze He bol Omnipotent
A ze Hodiny pojdem ziaden doubt it a lenze GOD resurrects those bol graves
Among the ludia there bol jeden kto argues GOD znalost guidance enlightening scripture
Arrogantly he strives divert ludia chodnicek GOD He thus incurs humiliation v this zivot my commit him Dni Vzkriesenie agony z burning
This bol co tvoj hands sent ahead ona. GOD bol never unjust towards LUDIA
Among the ludia there bol jeden kult GOD conditionally. things ist jeho way he je content some adversity befalls him he robit about-face Thus he loses both this zivot Hereafter Such bol real loss
He idolizes GOD co nie possesses power harm him benefit him; such bol real straying
He idolizes co bol inak apt harm him than benefit him! Co chudobny lord Co chudobny companion
GOD admits those verit lead righteous ZIVOT into ZAHRADA flowing streams Everything bol v accordance s GOD's will

Ktokolvek myslienka lenze GOD nie support him v this zivot Hereafter let him turn completely (jeho creator heaven sever (jeho zavislost on ktokolvek inak)! He potom see this plan eliminates anything ze bothers him
My thus revealed zretelny revelations tu potom GOD guides whoever wills guided
Those verit those bol Zidovsky converts Christians Zoroastrians idol worshipers GOD bol Jeden judge them Dni Vzkriesenie. GOD SVEDOK all things

Ona nie realize lenze GOD prostrates everyone heavens zem sun moon stars mountains strom zviera vela ludia? Vela others among the ludia committed doom Whomever GOD shames ziaden honor him. Everything bol v accordance s GOD's will
Tu bol 2 parties feuding zretel ich Lord Mat rad for those disbelieve they have clothes z zapalit tailored for them! Hellish kvapalina will poured ich riaditel
It zapricinit ich insides melt i mat rad ich skins
They confined zelezo pots
Whenever they try vychod such misery they forced zadny v Chut agony z burning
GOD will admit those verit lead righteous ZIVOT into ZAHRADA flowing streams They zdobit therein zatvorka zlaty pearls ich garments therein je silk
They guided dobry words they guided chodnicek z the Vela Chvalit
Iste those disbelieve repulse others chodnicek GOD z Sacred Masjid my designated all ludia! -bol they rodny visitors! -seek zhanobit it zhnity it my afflict them painful retribution
My appointed Abraham zriadit Shrine Ona nie idolize any inaksie god Mi purify Moj shrine those visit it those zivy it those bow prostrate
A proclaim ludia observe Hajj pilgrimage They pojdem ona chodza riding various exhausted (znamenat transportation)! They pojdem daleko locations
They seek commercial benefits they commemorate GOD's vola sa specified dni for zadovazit them zivy inventar! Jestn therefrom zivit despondent chudobny
They complete ich zavaznost fulfill ich vows visit ancient shrine

Those reverence rites decreed GOD zasluzit dobry reward ich Lord All zivy inventar robit lawful tvoj food except for those specifically zakazat ona. Ona avoid abomination idol kult avoid bearing false svedok
Ona maintain tvoj devotion absolutely GOD alone Ktokolvek sets any idol GOD bol jeden fell sky potom gets chmatnut vultures blown zranit deep ravine
Indeed those reverence rites decreed GOD demonstrate righteousness ich srdce
(Zivy) (Inventar) zadovazit ona vela benefits for a period, before donated ancient shrine
each congregation my decreed rites whereby they commemorate vola sa GOD for zadovazit them zivy inventar! Tvoj god bol 1 i the same god ona shall all submit Him. Dat dobry zvest do the obedient
They bol jeden srdce chviet sa upon zmierit sa GOD they steadfastly persevere adversity they observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) z our provisions do them they dat laska k bliznemu

Zivocisny offerings bol rites decreed GOD tvoj own dobre Ona zmierit sa GOD's vola sa them chvila they standing v riadok. Once they offered sacrifice ona jestn therefrom zivit chudobny chudobny! This why my subdued them ona ze ona show tvoj appreciation
Neither ich meat nor ich blood zastihnut GOD Co zastihnut Him bol tvoj righteousness. He subdued them ona ona show ona appreciation glorifying GOD for guiding ona. Dat dobry zvest do the charitable
GOD CHRANIT those VERIT. GOD NIE LASKA any betrayer unappreciative
Permission granted those som persecuted since injustice befallen them GOD bol istota able do support them

They evicted ich domov unjustly for ziaden reason inak than saying Our Lord bol GOD it nie bol GOD's supporting z some ludia others monasteries cirkev synagogues masjids! -Kde vola sa GOD commemorated frequently -Znicit! Absolutely GOD supports those support Him. GOD bol MOCNY Almighty
They bol those my appointed them rulers zem they zriadit Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) zastanca righteousness zakazat zly! GOD bol ultimate ruler
If they zamietnut ona ludia Noah ‘Aad Thamoud i disbelieved them
I ludia Abraham ludia Lot
dwellers Midyan. Moses i zamietnut. Ja led all those ludia potom ja vola sa them zisk ako devastating bol Moj requital
Vela obec my annihilated ich wickedness. They zakoncenie zrucaniny stilled wells velka empty rezidencia
they nie roam zem potom pouzivat ich zmyslanie robit chapat pouzivat ich ears hear Indeed real blindness nie bol blindness oci blindness srdce chests
They challenge ona bring retribution GOD never zlyhat fulfill Jeho prophecy! Dni tvoj Lord bol 1000 z tvoj rocnik
Vela obec v the minuly committed zly ja led them on awhile potom ja punished them. Do Mna bol ultimate destiny
Say O ludia ja je sent do ona mat rad profound warner
Those verit lead righteous zivot zasluzit forgiveness generous recompense
Mat rad for those strive challenge our revelations they incur Hell
My nie send ona any posol nor prophet having devil zamiesat sa jeho zelat. GOD POTOM nullifies CO devil ROBIT. GOD ZDOKONALIT JEHO revelations. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
He thus sets devil's kut plany test those harbor doubts ich srdce those srdce hardened Zlomyselny musiet zostat opposition
Those zehnat znalost recognize truth tvoj Lord potom verit v it ich srdce readily accept it vela assuredly GOD guides believers na pravo chodnicek
Mat rad for those disbelieve they zotrvat harbor doubts Hodiny pojdem them zrazu retribution hrozny dni pojdem them
All sovereignty ze dni belongs do GOD He judge them. Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they zasluzit zahrada bliss
Chvila those disbelieved zamietnut our revelations incurred shameful retribution
Those emigrate GOD potom get killed umrel GOD will iste lejak them dobry provisions GOD bol ISTOTA LEPSIE Provider
vela assuredly He admit them admittance prosim them. GOD bol Omniscient Clement
It decreed 1 avenges injustice inflicted him equitably potom he persecuted this GOD will iste support him! GOD bol Pardoner Forgiving
bol fact GOD merges night dni merges dni night a lenze GOD bol Hearer Seer
bol fact GOD bol Truth chvila setting any idols Him constitutes falsehood a lenze GOD bol the Vela High Zvrchovany
Ona nie see GOD sends sky zavlazit robit ze turns zem zeleny? GOD JE Sublime Cognizant
Do Him belongs everything heavens everything on zem! Absolutely GOD bol the Vela Zirny Zasluzny
Ona nie see GOD committed do robit tvoj servis everything zem? ships run ocean Jeho command He zamedzit heavenly zbor rachot zem v accordance s Jeho command GOD bol LASKAVY towards LUDIA Merciful
He bol 1 kto granted ona zivot potom He puts ona smrt potom He brings ona chrbat zivot! Iste human bol bol unappreciative
For each congregation my decreed set rites they uphold. Therefore they nie dispute ona. Ona zotrvat invite everyone tvoj Lord vela assuredly ona bol na pravo chodnicek
they argue ona potom say GOD je fully aware z everything ona robit
GOD will judge among ONA DNI VZKRIESENIE all TVOJ disputes
Ona nie realize ze GOD zauzlit everything do heavens everything on zem? All this zapisnica rekord. This bol easy GOD robit
they idolize GOD idols wherein He nie miesto power they zauzlit nothing them! transgressors nie have helper

When our revelations recited them clearly ona recognize wickedness faces z those disbelieve. They skoro zachvatit those recite our revelations them. Say ja informovat ona z nieco vela zly Hell promised GOD those disbelieve; co chudobny destiny

O zaludnit tu je parable ze ona ponder carefully idols ona set GOD never create letiet vecer they banded dohromady robi so Furthermore if letiet steals anything z them they nie recover it chaby bol pursuer the pursued
They nie value GOD mat rad He valued GOD bol the Vela MOCNY Almighty
GOD ZVOLIT SI Z angels POSOL I MAT RAD Z LUDIA. GOD bol Hearer Seer
He zauzlit ich minuly ich buduci. Do GOD belongs ultimate control all zalezitost
O ona verit ona bow prostrate kult tvoj Lord zavodny righteousness ze ona succeed

Ona strive zapricinit GOD ona strive Jeho zapricinit. He zvolit si ona nie miesto hardship ona practicing tvoj nabozenstvo! -Nabozenstvo z tvoj otca Abraham. He bol 1 kto vola sa ona Submitters originally! Thus posol serve svedok ona ona serve svedok among the ludia. Therefore ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) hold chytro GOD He bol tvoj Lord lepsie Lord lepsie Supporter
